tool_description: Extracts data from Aadhaar cards instantly and accurately.
name: Aadhaar Data Extraction Solution
title: Aadhaar Data Extraction Solution

api_list.name: Aadhaar Data Extraction Solution
api_list.description: Extraction of details from image of an Aadhaar card in real-time. You can additionally send more details in the request to perform a name match with the extracted fields.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aadhaar-data-extraction-solution.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/extract/ind_aadhaar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aadhaar-data-extraction-solution.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
